dmca.title: PortalOceania dives for copies
dmca.body:
Letter N.1 18/09/07

Infringement Notification for Web Search and all other products


1) The copyrighted work at issues is the text that appears at the website:
a) http://www.yesaustralia.com/turis-aventura.htm

2) The material that is infringing the copyrighted work in item n.1.
a) http://www.infoturismobrasil.com/paquetes_turisticos/turismoaventura/ecoturismo/aventura_na_australia.html

Search Query: Google ( Portuguese)

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner,
its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

___________________________________
[private]
18/09/07

---


From: Portal Oceania.com www.portaloceania.com
Email for contact: [private]@gmail.com or [private]@portaloceania.com
Address: Po Box 347 Pacific Fair 4218 Australia
Name: [private]
Phone XX 61 7 55721496

Letter n.2 18/09/07

Infringement Notification for Web Search and all other products


The copyrighted work at issues is the text that appears at the website www.portaloceania.com ( Portuguese)

The material that is infringing the copyrighted work in item n.1. Infringing web pages: content total copy and partial copy. ( Portuguese)
www.estudarnoexterior.com.br

http://www.estudarnoexterior.com.br/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=67&Itemid=74 Christchurch NZ

Search Query: Google ( Portuguese)

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing
is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

___________________________________
[private]
18/09/07

---
To: Removals@google.com
Google, Inc
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

From: Portal Oceania.com www.portaloceania.com www.yesaustralia.com
Letter n.3

Email for contact: [private]@gmail.com or [private]@portaloceania.com
Address: Po Box 347 Pacific Fair 4218 Australia
Name: [private]
Phone XX  [private]
